articles.author: ancient origins
articles.title: 30000 Year Arabian Standstill: A New Phase in Human Migration Detected - Ancient Origins
articles.description: Most scientists agree modern humans developed in Africa, more than 200,000 years ago, and that a great human diaspora across much of the rest of the world occurred between perhaps 60,000 and 50,000 years ago.
articles.content:
Ray Tobler /Shane T Grey /Yassine Souilmi /The Conversation
